title: Control at Stake: Evaluating the Security Landscape of LLM-Driven Email Agents
summary: The increasing capabilities of LLMs have led to the rapid proliferation of LLM agent apps, where developers enhance LLMs with access to external resources to support complex task execution. Among these, LLM email agent apps represent one of the widely used categories, as email remains a critical communication medium for users.
